title: Border, 1800–20
medium: Block-printed on joined sheets of handmade paper
description: Design is divided equally into two bands. On the top band, a highlighted leaf repeats continuously against a polka-dot background with edgings of dentils and tiny crescents. The lower band is simpler: a row of rosettes runs down the center against a background of vertical stripes; printed in blues and white over a pastel blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1800–20.
1800–20. Block-printed on joined sheets of handmade paper. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1972-42-84-a/c.
